name: Iara's Journey
description:
Iara's Journey is an action role-playing game with a level structure and puzzle elements, set in a futuristic totalitarian Norse mythological floating city. 

The player controls a girl warrior, that has to fight against different enemies, moving through platforms, viewed isometrically.  

Iara´s Journey is a game in early development.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

  • Move with WASD
  • Attack with Space

For a better experience play it with a controller

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

  • Oriol Abella: Game Design and Concept Art
  • Sergio Lumley: Game Design and Programming
  •  Ilya Landshut: 3D Modelling (in next updades)
  • Unity Content Team: free to use Kit of 3D elements and VFX
